3: Right at that moment, a bullet pierces the head of the Hetero-Creature.
It writhes on the ground but continues to breathe. That is, until a sharp blade cuts it in half.
Lucia shakes off the 'blood' from her blade, if that is what it is. Her imposing yet elegant manner is like that of a tiger lily.
A Hetero-Creature charges Lucia's blind spot from behind.
Before it tackles Lucia, the creature is intercepted by a blast from Liv's Levi-Gun.
Yeah, the song has stopped. There shouldn't be any more Hetero-Creatures.
Hetero-Creatures have started appearing here, too?
If those things are already here...
—The Red Tide must be close by.
